meanings.definition: To determine the total number of something.
meanings.sent1: She counts the apples in the basket.
meanings.sent2: Counting the stars in the sky is impossible.
meanings.sent3: He counts the sheep to fall asleep, but they keep jumping over the fence!
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, each smile counts as a precious moment.
meanings.sent5: The teacher counts the pencils to make sure everyone has one.

meanings.definition: To be of importance or significance.
meanings.sent2: Every opinion counts in a democracy.
meanings.sent3: In his heart, her happiness counts the most.
meanings.sent4: In times of need, every helping hand counts.
meanings.sent5: Your effort counts towards your success.

meanings.sent1: The suspect faced multiple counts of theft.
meanings.sent2: The prosecutor added a new count to the case.
meanings.sent3: The count in the courtroom made him nervous.
meanings.sent4: The count in the indictment surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The criminal had a long list of counts against him.
